snippet: The Pentagon will spend billions on emergency fixes to its nuclear weapons infrastructure, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel will announce Friday, after two studies found “systemic problems.”
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel announces he will present Pentagon plan to spend billions of dollars over next five years on emergency fixes to its nuclear weapons infrastructure; two separate studies have presented searing indictment of how Air Force's and Navy's aging nuclear weapons facilities, silos and submarine fleet have been allowed to decay since end of Cold War.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and WILLIAM J. BROAD
byline.contributor: David E. Sanger reported from Washington, and William J. Broad from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon will spend billions on emergency fixes to its nuclear weapons infrastructure, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel will announce Friday, after two studies found “systemic problems.”

headline.main: Pentagon Studies Reveal Major Nuclear Problems
